entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
